description: Civil Jury Trial Order Jury Trial set for 4/21/2025 at 09:00 AM in Courtroom 18B before Judge Dan Aaron Polster. Final Pretrial Conference set for 4/14/2025 at 10:00 AM in Courtroom 18B before Judge Dan Aaron Polster. Opening statements and the presentation of evidence will begin as soon as the jury has been selected. Plaintiff shall have 15 hours and Defendant shall have 15 hours in which to conduct their direct and cross examinations, rebuttal and sur-rebuttal cases. Counsel are directed to plan their trial strategy accordingly. Trial documents are due no later than 12:00 p.m. on March 31, 2025. Any Daubert motions or motions in limine must be filed on or before 12:00 p.m. on February 21, 2025. Responses must be filed by 12:00 p.m. on March 7, 2025, and replies must be filed by 12:00 p.m. on March 14, 2025. Signed by Judge Dan Aaron Polster on 12/27/2024. Counsel is advised to read the Order in its entirety. (K,K) (Entered: 12/27/2024)
